outline.title: 鮮乳網站專案報告
outline.summary: 專案封面，包含標題、副標題、專案名稱與日期。
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/msLhzh70TJLH.jpeg - The cover slide needs a high-quality image of milk. Image 1 is a clean, appealing bottle of "Raw Milk" which fits the theme of a "fresh milk website project."

outline.title: 專案願景與目標
outline.summary: 介紹打造台灣最完整純鮮乳資訊平台的願景、核心目標與目標受眾。
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/dbJyFHJLV3Kb.jpg - This slide discusses the project vision and goals related to various milk brands and consumer choice. Image 5 shows a variety of different milk containers and brands, visually representing the comprehensive platform goal.

outline.title: 專案開發進度總覽
outline.summary: 展示目前已完成的規劃階段項目與進行中的開發階段項目狀態。
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/BeEsx3yYxoES.jpg - This slide is about project progress and status. Image 16 is a clear "Project Roadmap Timeline Template" which visually represents progress and planning, fitting the content well.

outline.title: 核心功能模組
outline.summary: 詳細介紹品牌清單、產品資訊、搜尋功能、投稿功能與產品圖片五大核心功能。
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/rI6pntX0aAl9.jpg - This slide lists core functional modules, including product information and images. Image 7 shows various milk bottle designs and branding, which relates to the product display and branding focus of the functions.

outline.title: 系統架構設計
outline.summary: 說明前端、後端技術棧選擇與部署架構規劃。
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/XUBea0vHqMQy.webp - This slide details the system architecture and technology stack (React/Vue, Node.js/Python, MySQL/PostgreSQL). Image 10 is a clean diagram titled "Setting up tech stack" with various logos, directly illustrating the slide's content.

outline.title: 資料架構設計
outline.summary: 展示以殺菌方式為核心的分類體系與品牌資料欄位結構。
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/VF4tGSxiu0ao.jpg - This slide focuses on data structure, particularly the classification by pasteurization methods and product features. Image 3 shows generic, clean glass milk bottles, which can represent the pure product data being classified.

outline.title: 使用者介面設計方向
outline.summary: 闡述簡約俐落的 MUJI 風格設計原則與主要頁面規劃。
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/9moz4wtMYthm.jpg - This slide discusses UI design direction, emphasizing a clean, high-quality look (MUJI style). Image 8 shows clean, modern milk bottles in a dynamic setting, conveying a sense of quality and design aesthetic.

outline.title: 開發里程碑規劃
outline.summary: 列出基礎建設、核心開發、功能完善與上線優化四個階段的規劃。
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/2SM8WeQioMNt.png - This slide outlines the development milestones and phases. Image 15 is a "Project Roadmap Templates" visual, which is highly relevant to planning and milestones. (Using 15 as 16 was used for Slide 3).

outline.title: 版本控制與協作
outline.summary: 提供 GitHub 儲存庫資訊與團隊協作機制說明。
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/Mw9XUo8FV0XR.png - This slide is about version control and collaboration using GitHub. Image 14 is a software architecture diagram showing collaboration and system components, which can represent the technical collaboration structure.

outline.title: 下一步行動計畫
outline.summary: 列出近期優先事項、中期目標與長期願景。
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/ULMjYQ0TyVOm.png - This slide details the next steps and action plan. Image 13 is a software architecture diagram that can represent the planning and structural steps being taken next.

outline.title: 總結
outline.summary: 回顧專案亮點並提供聯繫方式。
